sentences.sContent: 59About an hour later another asserted, "Certainly this fellow was with him, for he is a Galilean."
sentences.sContent_eng: 59About an hour later another asserted, "Certainly this fellow was with him, for he is a Galilean."
sentences.sCn: 约过了一小时，又有一个人极力地说：“他实在是同那人一夥的，因为他也是加利利人。”

sentences.sContent: Luke takes this passage that he finds later in Mark and he moves it and plops it down at the beginning of Jesus' Galilean ministry.
sentences.sContent_eng: Luke takes this passage that he finds later in Mark and he moves it and plops it down at the beginning of Jesus' Galilean ministry.
sentences.sCn: 这段原本应在马可福音后半,路加把它提前到了,耶稣加利利布道的开头。

sentences.sContent: At the right side of the frame is ruling gas giant Jupiter, flanked along a line by all four of its Galilean satellites.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the right side of the frame is ruling gas giant Jupiter, flanked along a line by all four of its Galilean satellites.
sentences.sCn: 图片右侧则是巨大的气态行星木星。 它的全部4颗伽利略卫星环绕其周围与之排成一线。

synos.tran: 加利利人；耶稣；基督教徒

trans.tranCn: 伽利略的, 加利利的（位于巴基斯坦北部）
